title.native: 魔王学院の不適合者 ～史上最強の魔王の始祖、転生して子孫たちの学校へ通う～
title.romaji: Maou Gakuin no Futekigousha: Shijou Saikyou no Maou no Shiso, Tensei shite Shison-tachi no Gakkou e Kayou
title.english: The Misfit of Demon King Academy: History’s Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants

description:
Anos, the Demon King of Tyranny, has defeated humans, spirits, and gods alike. But even demon kings get tired of all the fighting sometimes! Hoping for a more peaceful life, Anos decides to reincarnate himself. When he wakes two thousand years later, though, he finds the world has become too peaceful--his descendants have grown weak and magic is in serious decline. Intending to reclaim his rightful place, he enrolls in Demon King Academy, where he finds that his magical power is off the charts. Literally. And because they can't measure his power, the faculty and other students regard Anos as a misfit. With the support of Misha, the one student he manages to befriend, the misfit (Demon King) begins his climb up the demon ranks!

(Source: Square Enix Manga & Books)
synonyms: The Misfit of Demon King Academy
ใครว่าข้าไม่เหมาะเป็นจอมมาร: ต้นตระกูลจอมมารที่เเกร่งที่สุดในประวัติศาสตร์เกิดใหม่ไปเรียนที่โรงเรียนลูกหลาน
魔王学院的不适任者～史上最强的魔王始祖，转生就读子孙们的学校～

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/M_ars)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tayutayu2)

Affiliated with [C-Station](https://anilist.co/studio/6074/CStation).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大沼心) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin_Oonuma)

After graduating from Chiyoda Institute of Technology he joined Office AO where he worked as an animator. He later joined Shaft in 2004 as a subcontractor, and he became [Akiyuki Shinbou's](https://anilist.co/staff/100089/) right hand until 2009. When he stopped working for Shaft, he found his new home at studio Silver Link, where he is to-date known as their most prominent director. Noted for directing shows such as [ef: A Tale of Melodies](https://anilist.co/anime/4789/), [Baka to Test](https://anilist.co/anime/6347/) and [Kokoro Connect](https://anilist.co/anime/11887/).

Oonuma is known to like so called moe games.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/suke_mausu)

Affiliated with [Studio Mausu](https://anilist.co/studio/719/Studio-Mausu).
Keiji Inai is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with the music production company IMAGINE.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/minatomirai2013)

Affiliated with [SILVER LINK](https://anilist.co/studio/300/SILVER-LINK).

**Height:** 155 cm (5'1")

**[Website](https://www.kusunokitomori.com/) | [Profile (SMA)](https://www.sma.co.jp/s/sma/artist/441?ima=0000#/news/0) | [Profile (SMA VOICE)](http://smavoice.jp/s/sma03/artist/45?ima=5736) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomori_kusunoki)**

A Japanese voice actress who is currently affiliated with the Sony Music Artists agency. She made her voice acting debut in 2017, and in the same year she was cast in her first main role as Kirara, the heroine of the Japanese mobile game _Kirara Fantasia_. 

In September 2022, [Tomori announced her diagnosis with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (EDS) affecting her joints](https://www.kusunokitomori.com/info/archive/?id=546582), which limits her ability to engage in physically demanding activities such as dancing. [It was announced on Love Live!’s website at the same time](https://www.lovelive-anime.jp/news/01_1248.html) that she would be graduating from the role of [Setsuna Yuuki](https://anilist.co/character/132796/Yuki-Setsuna) in March 2023, with [Coco Hayashi](https://anilist.co/staff/124857) replacing her in the role.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- [Vice](https://anilist.co/character/277198) - Alchemy Stars (VG)
- [Kanade Yoisaki](https://anilist.co/character/249636) - Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku (VG)
- Viper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Seattle](https://anilist.co/character/197197), [I-58](https://anilist.co/character/228624), Glasgow - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Aunn Komano](https://anilist.co/character/145527) - Touhou Cannonball (VG)
- Vanessa - Cytus II (VG)
- [Ruka Kayamori](https://anilist.co/character/321897) - Heaven Burns Red (VG)
- [Firefly](https://anilist.co/character/349493) - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

__[Website](https://civi-l-ian.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/CIVILIAN_LyuLyu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/civilian_official/) | [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/koyama_nanou)__

__Introduction:__
Civilian, previously known as Lyu:Lyu and -itsuka-, is a Japanese three-piece rock band under record labels Sony Records (2016–), SPACE SHOWER MUSIC (2013–) and coolism records (2009–), having previously been under Eustoma Records (2016).

__Biography:__
The band was formed by classmates Hidekazu Koyama, Junichi Katou and Kiyoyuki Arita in 2008 under the name -itsuka-, they changed their name to Lyu:Lyu in 2009, and changed their name once again on July 18, 2016 to CIVILIAN.

__Members:__
- [Hidekazu Koyama](https://anilist.co/staff/177198/Hidekazu-Koyama) (小山秀和, コヤマヒデカズ) – vocalist, guitarist and in-charge of lyrics and composition
- [Junichi Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/177200/Junichi-Katou) (加藤純市), better known by stage name Junichi (純市, じゅんいち) – bassist, also helps with composition and arrangement
- [Kiyoyuki Arita](https://anilist.co/staff/177199/Kiyoyuki-Arita) (有田清幸, ありたきよゆき) – drummer, also helps with composition and arrangement

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/koyama_nanou) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/MsNanou2) | [Nico Nico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/10108605/mylist) | [Tumblr](https://nanou16g.tumblr.com)__

__Hidekazu Koyama__, alternatively known as a vocaloid producer under the names Nanou, Hoehoe-P and Getsumen, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, guitarist and member of the rock band [CIVILIAN](https://anilist.co/staff/149203).

As a vocaloid producer, he has created both covers and original songs, where he mainly used the vocaloid Hatsune Miku. Additionally, many of his original songs have entered the Nico Nico Douga Hall of Fame. He also used to cover songs as an utaite.

__[Website](https://civi-l-ian.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/CIVILIAN_LyuLyu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/civilian_official/) | [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/koyama_nanou)__

__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/drumCIVILIAN) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/drumCIVILIAN/)__

__Kiyoyuki Arita__ is a Japanese drummer, composer, instructor, photographer and member of the rock band [CIVILIAN](https://anilist.co/staff/149203).

**Height:** 155 cm (5'1")

**[Website](https://www.kusunokitomori.com/) | [Profile (SMA)](https://www.sma.co.jp/s/sma/artist/441?ima=0000#/news/0) | [Profile (SMA VOICE)](http://smavoice.jp/s/sma03/artist/45?ima=5736) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomori_kusunoki)**
